skills.name: Calculate the cube of a number

explanations.A: 1 cubed = 1 x 1 x 1 = 1. This is also an odd number, so the answer is 1
explanations.B: Not quite. 3 is odd but it isn't a cube number. Remember we get cube numbers by multiplying 3 copies of the same number together
explanations.C: Not quite, 8 is a cubed number but it isn't odd. Try looking at the first few cube numbers and seeing which of them is odd.
explanations.D: Not quite. 27 is an odd cubed number, but it isn't the smallest one.

explanations.A: 1 cubed = 1 x 1 x 1 = 1, so 1 is the smallest cubed number
explanations.B: Not quite. 2 isn't a cube number. Remember we get cube numbers by multiplying 3 copies of the same number together
explanations.C: Not quite, 6 isn't a cube number. I think you have done 2 x 3 rather than 2 x 2 x 2. Remember we get cube numbers by multiplying 3 copies of the same number together
explanations.D: Not quite. 27 is a cube number, but it isn't the smallest one in the list

explanations.A: The small 3 means cubed, and it tells us we have to multiply 3 copies of 65 together.
explanations.B: Not quite, the 3 is a power. It tells us how many copies of the large number we have to multiply together
explanations.C: Almost. Remember with powers we need to multiply the numbers
explanations.D: Not quite, the 3 is a power. It tells us how many copies of the large number we have to multiply together

explanations.A: Not quite, the 3 is a power. It tells us how many copies of the large number we have to multiply together
explanations.B: Not quite, the 3 is a power. It tells us how many copies of the large number we have to multiply together
explanations.C: Almost. Remember with powers we need to multiply the numbers
explanations.D: The small 3 means cubed, and it tells us we have to multiply 3 copies of 24 together.

explanations.A: Not quite, I think you have multiplied 3 by 4 rather than multiplying 3 copies of 4 together
explanations.B: Almost. I think you found 4 squared rather than 4 cubed. You need to multiply by 4 again
explanations.C: Not quite. 4 cubed means we have to multiply 3 copies of 4 together
explanations.D: 4 cubed means 4 x 4 x 4. 4 x 4 = 16, so we multiply this by 4 again to get 64

explanations.A: Almost. I think you found 2 squared rather than 2 cubed. You need to multiply by 2 again
explanations.B: Not quite, I think you have multiplied 3 by 2 rather than multiplying 3 copies of 2 together
explanations.C: 2 cubed means 2 x 2 x 2. 2 x 2 = 4, so we multiply this by 2 again to get 8
explanations.D: Not quite. 2 cubed means we have to multiply 3 copies of 2 together

explanations.A: Not quite. 6 cubed means we have to multiply 3 copies of 6 together
explanations.B: 6 cubed means 6 x 6 x 6. 6 x 6 = 36, so we multiply this by 6 again to get 216
explanations.C: Not quite, I think you have multiplied 3 by 6 rather than multiplying 3 copies of 6 together
explanations.D: Almost. I think you found 6 squared rather than 6 cubed. You need to multiply by 6 again

explanations.A: Not quite, I think you have multiplied 3 by 5 rather than multiplying 3 copies of 5 together
explanations.B: Almost. I think you found 5 squared rather than 5 cubed. You need to multiply by 5 again
explanations.C: 5 cubed means 5 x 5 x 5. 5 x 5 = 25, so we multiply this by 5 again to get 125
explanations.D: Not quite. 5 cubed means we have to multiply 3 copies of 5 together

explanations.A: Almost. Just check that you have multiplied 3 copies of 100 together
explanations.B: Not quite. 100 cubed means we have to multiply 3 copies of 100 together
explanations.C: 100 cubed means 100 x 100 x 100. 100 x 100 = 10,000, so we multiply this by 100 again to get 1,000,000
explanations.D: Not quite, I think you have multiplied 3 by 100 rather than multiplying 3 copies of 100 together

explanations.A: Not quite, I think you have multiplied 3 by 100 rather than multiplying 3 copies of 100 together
explanations.B: Almost. Just check that you have multiplied 3 copies of 100 together
explanations.C: 100 cubed means 100 x 100 x 100. 100 x 100 = 1,0000, so we multiply this by 100 again to get 1,000,000
explanations.D: Not quite. 100 cubed means we have to multiply 3 copies of 100 together
